Santa_Monica.King Fahad Mosque (Culver City, Californ: The King Fahad Mosque (also King Fahd Mosque) is a mosque located in Culver City, California in Los Angeles County. The mosque occupies about 7,200 square meters of land, has a capacity of 2,000 worshippers, "a marble facade, hand made tiles from Turkey, and a 72 foot high minaret topped with a gold leaf crescent". The complex also contains a lecture and meeting hall, "classrooms, research centers, a bookshop, a children’s playground, and a car park".
